bulletPoints: Created a responsive invoice app with React and html2canvas, reducing generation time by 80% and offering extensive customization options.

Automated form submissions and email data parsing, achieving 80% faster submissions, 95% data accuracy, and halving processing time. Streamlined cloud resource management and deployment with AWS CloudFormation and CDK V2, boosting security and response times by 20% through strategic AWS IAM and API Gateway configurations.

Engineered a secure, cross-platform application with Electron and React, enhancing OS compatibility and user-facing features. Integrated WebSocket for improved network traffic and real-time updates. Deployed a fast, user-friendly landing page with AWS Amplify and NextJS.

Architected a scalable backend for a real-time IoT application. Enhanced database interactions and security, and improved codebase maintainability with a database models abstraction layer. Optimized module fetching and caching with ESbuild plugins, improving loading and transpiling times. Validated functionalities through automated testing.

Automated tasks and boosted efficiency by developing VBA macros, halving processing time, and minimizing data entry errors to 5% through custom Excel functions. Utilized Power BI for interactive tracking of key performance indicators across 500+ properties.
